glsa.title: cURL: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cURL, the worst of which could lead to man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: cURL is a command line tool for transferring files with URL syntax, supporting numerous protocols.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cURL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a man-in-the-middle attack via a crafted certificate issued by a legitimate certification authority. Furthermore, a context-dependent attacker may be able to bypass security restrictions by connecting as other users.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
